verses.name: John 16:1
verses.text: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.

verses.name: John 16:2
verses.text: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.

verses.name: John 16:3
verses.text: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.

verses.name: John 16:4
verses.text: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.
